description: We know, it’s hard to believe, but Thanksgiving is next week. So that means Black Friday is next week, and that means the sales are on.
title: What time do the stores open on Black Friday?
title_page: What time do the stores open on Black Friday?
text:
We know, it’s hard to believe, but Thanksgiving is next week.
So that means Black Friday is next week, and that means the sales are on.
To help you get your shopping game plan finalized, here is a quick-check list from The BlackFriday.com of stores that are open on Thanksgiving, the ones that are closed and what time everyone opens on Black Friday.
What’s open Thanksgiving
• Bass Pro Shops – 8 a.m. to 6 p.m.
• Bealls – 6 p.m. to midnight
• Belk's – Opens 6 p.m.
• Best Buy – 5 p.m. to 1 a.m.
• Big Lots – 7 a.m. to midnight
• CVS Pharmacy – Hours vary by location
• Dick's Sporting Goods – 6 p.m. overnight to 2 p.m. Friday
• Dollar General – 7 a.m. to 10 p.m.
• Five Below – 6 p.m. to 1 a.m.
• Fossil – 9 p.m. overnight to Friday for most stores
• Fred's Pharmacy – Regular hours
• Goody's – 12 p.m. to 1 a.m.
• JCPenney – 3 p.m. overnight to 5 p.m. Friday
• Kohl's – 6 p.m. overnight
• Kmart – 7 p.m. overnight to 2 p.m. Friday
• Macy's – 5 p.m. to 2 a.m.
• Michael's – 6 p.m. to midnight
• Old Navy – 4 p.m overnight to midnight Black Friday
• Rite Aid – Most stores open
• Sears – 6 p.m. to midnight
• Shoe Carnival – 6 p.m. to midnight
• Stein Mart – 5 p.m. to 11 p.m.
• Target – 6 p.m. overnight to 10 p.m., 11 p.m., or midnight on Black Friday (varies by location)
• Toys R Us – 5 p.m. Thanksgiving through 11 p.m. Black Friday
• ULTA – 6 p.m. to 2 a.m.
• Walgreens – 8 a.m. to 10 p.m.
• Walmart – Walmart stores will be open regular hours on Thanksgiving. Thanksgiving/Black Friday sales start at 6 p.m
Stores closed on Thanksgiving
• Academy Sports + Outdoors
• American Girl
• Barnes & Noble
• Bed Bath & Beyond
• Burlington
• Cabela's
• Costco
• Crate and Barrel
• Dillard's
• Dressbarn
• DSW
• GameStop
• Harbor Freight
• hhgregg
• Hobby Lobby
• Home Depot
• HomeGoods
• IKEA
• Jo-Ann Fabric & Craft Stores
• Jos. A. Bank
• Lowe's
• Marshalls
• Mattress Firm
• Neiman Marcus
• Nordstrom
• Nordstrom Rack
• Office Depot and OfficeMax
• Petco
• PetSmart
• Pier 1 Imports
• Publix
• Sam's Club
• Staples
• T.J. Maxx
• Tractor Supply
• Von Maur
What time stores open on Black Friday
• Academy Sports: Open 5 a.m.
• Bath and Body Works: Opens 6 a.m.
• Bealls Florida: Opens 5 a.m.
• Bealls: Opens 6 a.m.
• Belk: Opens 6 a.m.
• Best Buy will open at 5 p.m. on Thanksgiving and close at 1 a.m. Friday, then reopen at 8 a.m. Friday.
• Big Lots: Open 6 a.m.
• BJ's Wholesale Club: Opens 7 a.m.
• Burlington Coat Factory: Opens 7 a.m.
• Chico's: Opens 7 a.m.
• Costco: Opens 10 a.m. to 8:30 p.m. (Hours could vary by store or region. Check for updates.)
• Crate & Barrel: Varies by location.
• Dillards: Opens 8 a.m.
• Dollar General: Opens 7 a.m.
• Guitar Center: Opens 6 a.m.
• Harbor Freight: Opens 7 a.m.
• hhgregg: Opens 7 a.m.
• Hobby Lobby: Opens 8 a.m.
• Black Friday - Open 6 a.m.
• HomeGoods: Opens 7 a.m.
• JC Penney: Opens at 3 p.m. Thanksgiving Day, and will stay open Friday until 10 p.m.
• Jo-Ann Fabric and Craft Stores: Opens 6 a.m.
• Jos. A. Bank: Opens 8 a.m.
• Kohl's: Opens 6 p.m. Thanksgiving through Black Friday
• Lowe's: Opens 6 a.m.
• Macy's: Opens 6 a.m.
• Marshalls: Opens 7 a.m. (Some locations may vary.)
• Nordstrom: Vary by location
• Office Depot and OfficeMax: Opens 6 a.m.
• Petco: Opens 7 a.m.
• PetSmart: Opens 7 a.m.
• Pier 1 Imports: Opens 8 a.m.
• Publix: Opens 7 a.m.
• Rite Aid: Opens 7 a.m.
• Sam's Club: Opens 7 a.m
• Sears: Opens at 5 a.m.
• Shoe Carnival: Opens 6 a.m.
• Sierra Trading Post: Opens 6 a.m.
• Staples: Opens 6 a.m.
• Stein Mart: Opens 7 a.m.
• Target: Opens at 6 p.m. on Thanksgiving and stays open through Black Friday
• Toys R Us: Opens at 5 p.m. Thanksgiving and remains open for 30 hours straight.
• The Container Store: Open regular hours
• The Original Mattress Factory: Open s10 a.m.
• T.J. Maxx: Opens 7 a.m. (most stores.)
• Tractor Supply: Opens 6 a.m. or 7 a.m. (Varies by location.)
• Von Maur: Opens 9 a.m.
